rules_text:
Double strike
When Flamebraced Slayer attacks, creature tokens get +1/+1 for each equipment attached to Flamebraced Slayer.
[i]Metalcraft[/i] – As long as you control three or more artifacts, Flamebraced Slayer has “{0}: Attach target equipment you control to Flamebraced Slayer. Activate only once during each turn.”
